body:
A detail that may or may not matter: just before this particular crash, I had tried to update all the tools:
```
for i in benchcmp bundle callgraph cover digraph eg fiximports godex godoc \
goimports gomvpkg gorename gotype guru html2article oracle present ssadump \
stress stringer tip ; do go get -u golang.org/x/tools/cmd/$i; done
```
